item.title: 解说员：波音认罪协议会如何影响飞机制造商
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士周日表示，美国司法部将对波音公司在两起致命空难中的欺诈行为提出刑事指控，并要求该飞机制造商认罪或接受审判。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department will criminally charge Boeing with fraud over two fatal crashes and ask the planemaker to plead guilty or face a trial, people familiar with the matter said on Sunday.】

item.title: 精神航空任命新首席财务官
item.description: 低成本航空公司精神航空（Spirit Airlines）周一表示，已任命弗雷德-克罗默（Fred Cromer）为新任首席财务官，自 7 月 8 日起生效。【原文：Low-cost carrier Spirit Airlines said on Monday it has appointed Fred Cromer as its new chief financial officer, effective July 8.】

item.title: 兴登堡收到印度市场监管机构的 "说明理由 "函
item.description: 兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）周一表示，该公司收到了市场监管机构印度证券交易委员会（SEBI）的一封 "说明理由 "信，因为去年这家美国做空机构发布了一份关于阿达尼企业的报告。【原文：Hindenburg Research said on Monday it received a "show cause" letter from market regulator Securities and Exchanges Board of India (SEBI) after the U.S. short-seller put out a report on Adani Enterprises last year.】

item.title: 波音-精神：飞机制造商如何瓜分陷入困境的供应商
item.description: 波音公司斥资 47 亿美元回购 Spirit AeroSystems 公司的交易，是飞机巨头和它们的一家主要供应商之间经过三方谈判达成的，是一项罕见的因危机而产生的三角交易。【原文：Hashed out in three-way talks between plane giants and one of their key suppliers, Boeing's $4.7 billion deal to buy back Spirit AeroSystems is a rare triangular deal born out of crisis.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空客上半年交付量增长 2
item.description: 业内消息人士周一称，空中客车公司 6 月份初步交付了约 67 架飞机，使今年上半年的飞机交付总量达到约 323 架，比去年同期增长 2%。【原文：Airbus delivered a preliminary total of around 67 airplanes in June, bringing the total for the first half of the year to around 323 aircraft, up 2% from the same period last year, industry sources said on Monday.】

item.title: 纽约杂货商 Gristedes 斥资数百万美元解决美国温室气体指控
item.description: 美国司法部周一表示，纽约连锁超市格里斯蒂德（Gristedes）将支付 40 万美元的民事罚款，并花费 1350 万美元进行维修和升级，以解决其商店冰箱排放的温室气体远高于竞争对手冰箱的指控。【原文：The New York supermarket chain Gristedes will pay a $400,000 civil fine and spend $13.5 million on repairs and upgrades to settle charges that its store refrigerators emitted far more greenhouse gases than rivals' refrigerators, the U.S. Department of Justice said on Monday.】

item.title: 马士基首席执行官称，红海海况中断将持续到第三季度
item.description: 丹麦船运公司马士基（Maersk）周一表示，未来几个月对承运商和企业来说将充满挑战，因为红海集装箱运输的中断将持续到第三季度。【原文：The coming months will be challenging for carriers and businesses, as disruptions to container shipping via the Red Sea continue into the third quarter, Danish shipping company Maersk said on Monday.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，派拉蒙正在寻找流媒体合作伙伴
item.description: 据 CNBC 周一援引知情人士的话报道，派拉蒙全球公司正在与其他媒体公司就其流媒体平台与现有平台合并事宜进行谈判。【原文：Paramount Global is holding talks with other media companies about merging its streaming platform with an existing platform, CNBC reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行不急于进一步降息
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周一表示，欧洲央行需要更多的时间来得出结论，即通胀率正坚定地走在通往2%的道路上，而且良性的经济发展表明降息并不迫切。【原文：The European Central Bank needs more time to conclude that inflation is firmly on a path to 2% and benign economic developments indicate that rate cuts are not urgent, ECB President Christine Lagarde said on Monday.】

item.title: 谷歌将要求披露选举广告中的数字篡改内容
item.description: 谷歌周一表示，将强制要求广告商披露使用数字篡改内容来描绘真实或逼真的人物或事件的选举广告，这是谷歌为打击选举虚假信息而采取的最新措施。【原文：Google said on Monday it would make it mandatory for advertisers to disclose election ads that use digitally altered content to depict real or realistic-looking people or events, its latest step to battle election misinformation.】

item.title: 特斯拉在发布第二季度交付报告前上涨
item.description: 特斯拉股价周一上涨近 6%，此前一家华尔街重要券商在该汽车制造商周二发布季度生产和交付报告前，将该股列入观察名单。【原文：Shares of Tesla gained nearly 6% on Monday, after a key Wall Street brokerage added the stock to its watch list ahead of the automaker's quarterly production and delivery report on Tuesday.】

item.title: 交易应用 Robinhood 与冥王星资本达成交易，以利用人工智能
item.description: Robinhood Markets周一表示，它已经收购了人工智能驱动的投资平台Pluto Capital，这使该交易应用程序成为越来越多寻求为客户提供人工智能工具的公司中的一员。【原文：Robinhood Markets said on Monday it had bought artificial intelligence-powered investment platform Pluto Capital, adding the trading app to a growing list of companies looking to offer AI tools to customers.】

item.title: 咆哮的凯蒂猫》因涉嫌操纵 GameStop 而被起诉
item.description: 基思-吉尔（Keith Gill），这位被称为 "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "的投资者，曾在 2021 年帮助刺激了 meme 股票的狂热，他被 GameStop 的投资者起诉，称他们在他对这家电子游戏零售商的 "抽水-抛售 "计划中蒙受了损失。【原文：Keith Gill, the investor known as "Roaring Kitty" who helped spur the meme stock mania of 2021, was sued by GameStop investors who said they lost money through his "pump-and-dump" scheme for the videogame retailer.】

item.title: 日元贬值，越来越多的美国游客说 "konnichiwa"（こんにちは）。
item.description: 受日元贬值的吸引，今年前往日本的美国游客激增，这也促使外国投资者对日本住宿市场的兴趣大增。【原文：American tourists headed for Japan have surged this year, lured by a slump in the value of the yen, which is also driving a massive jump in foreign investor interest in the country's lodgings market.】

item.title: 咆哮的小猫 "所倡导的宠物用品网站 Chewy 是什么？
item.description: 周一，"咆哮的小猫"（Roaring Kitty）股票交易员基思-吉尔（Keith Gill）将 Chewy Inc 推到了聚光灯下，他在这家宠物用品在线零售商身上下了 2.45 亿美元的赌注。【原文：Keith Gill, the meme stock trader "Roaring Kitty," thrust Chewy Inc into the spotlight when he made a $245 million bet on the online pet products retailer on Monday.】

item.title: 消息来源：Schonfeld 旗舰对冲基金上半年业绩增长 10.3
item.description: 对冲基金 Schonfeld Strategic Advisors 旗下的旗舰基金 Strategic Partners 上月底上涨了 1.9%，一位熟悉内情的消息人士称，在不同策略的积极表现推动下，该基金今年上半年上涨了 10.3%。【原文：Hedge fund Schonfeld Strategic Advisors' flagship fund Strategic Partners ended the first half of the year up 10.3%, driven by positive performance across different strategies and after posting a gain of 1.9% last month, a source familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚航空公司计划秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 哥伦比亚航空公司的控股公司周一表示，阿维安卡集团计划在美国秘密申请首次公开募股。【原文：Avianca Group plans to confidentially file for an initial public offering in the United States, the holding company for the Colombian airline said on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行、加拿大加入 G10 央行 6 月宽松大军
item.description: 欧洲中央银行和加拿大央行在 6 月份加入了大型央行放宽政策的行列，而新兴市场则继续寻求降低利率。【原文：The European Central Bank and the Bank of Canada in June joined the ranks of big central banks easing policy, while emerging markets ploughed ahead in their quest to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 家乐福从 Cora 和 Match 的收购中看到了更多的上升空间
item.description: 欧洲最大的食品零售商家乐福周一表示，预计收购 Cora 和 Match 零售商将带来比以前更大的经济效益。【原文：Europe's biggest food retailer Carrefour said on Monday it was expecting greater financial benefits from the acquisition of the Cora and Match retailers than previously.】

item.title: 在线博彩公司 Flutter 邀请迪士尼资深员工加入董事会
item.description: 全球最大的在线博彩公司 Flutter Entertainment 周一表示，已任命华特迪士尼前财务总监克里斯蒂娜-麦卡锡（Christine McCarthy）为董事会成员。【原文：Flutter Entertainment , the world's largest online betting firm, said on Monday it has appointed Walt Disney's former finance chief Christine McCarthy to its board of directors.】

item.title: CDK Global的黑客攻击为何给美国汽车销售蒙上阴影？
item.description: CDK Global 公司周一表示，预计所有经销商将在 7 月 3 日晚些时候或 7 月 4 日凌晨启用其经销商管理系统（DMS）。【原文：CDK Global said on Monday it anticipates all dealers to be live on its dealer management system (DMS) by late July 3 or early morning on July 4, about two weeks after a cyberattack-led outage upended operations across car dealerships in the U.S.】

item.title: 消息人士称赛诺菲有意在德国投资高达 16 亿美元的胰岛素项目
item.description: 一位熟悉该计划的人士周一告诉路透社，法国制药商赛诺菲即将决定投资 13 亿至 15 亿欧元（14 亿至 16 亿美元）来升级其在德国的长效胰岛素注射剂生产。【原文：French drugmaker Sanofi is nearing a decision to invest between 1.3 billion and 1.5 billion euros ($1.4-$1.6 billion) to upgrade its production of long-acting insulin shots in Germany, a person familiar with the plan told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: CDK 预计所有经销商将于 7 月 4 日初上线
item.description: CDK 周一表示，预计所有经销商将在 7 月 3 日晚些时候或 7 月 4 日清晨启用其经销商管理系统（DMS）。【原文：CDK said on Monday it anticipates all dealers to be live on its dealer management system (DMS) by late July 3 or early morning on July 4.】

item.title: 法拉利推出电池更换计划，以保持其汽车的性能和价值
item.description: 豪华跑车制造商法拉利周一宣布了两项新的延长保修计划，允许其混合动力车型的车主在指定时间更换电池。【原文：Luxury sports car maker Ferrari on Monday announced two new warranty extension schemes allowing owners of its hybrid models to have the batteries of their vehicles replaced at given times.】

item.title: 消息人士称，法国反垄断监管机构正准备对英伟达提出指控
item.description: 直接知情人士透露，法国反垄断监管机构正准备对 Nvidia 涉嫌反竞争的行为提出指控，Nvidia 将成为第一个这样做的执法者。【原文：French antitrust regulators are preparing to charge Nvidia for allegedly anti-competitive practices, people with direct knowledge of the matter said, making it the first enforcer to do so.】

item.title: 贝莱德推出股票 ETF，100% 对冲下跌风险
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）周一表示，该公司已推出一款 "缓冲 "交易所交易基金，旨在为那些希望进入股票市场的风险偏好型投资者提供 100% 的下行对冲。【原文：BlackRock has launched a 'buffer' exchange-traded fund that seeks to offer a 100% downside hedge to risk-shy investors looking to tap the equity markets, the world's largest asset manager said on Monday.】

item.title: 交易应用程序 Robinhood 表示正在努力解决服务中断问题
item.description: Robinhood 周一表示，该公司正在努力解决导致其交易平台部分用户服务中断的问题。【原文：Robinhood said on Monday it was working to resolve an issue causing service interruptions for some users on its trading platform.】

item.title: 美国 5 月建筑支出意外下降
item.description: 由于较高的抵押贷款利率抑制了独户住宅的建设，美国 5 月份的建筑支出意外下降，而住房供应的改善可能会抑制建筑业的复苏。【原文：U.S. construction spending unexpectedly fell in May as higher mortgage rates depressed single-family homebuilding, and recovery is likely to be muted by improving housing supply.】

item.title: 空中客车可能最终拥有 Spirit Aero 在苏格兰和马来西亚的部分资产
item.description: 空中客车公司周一提交的一份文件显示，如果这家跨大西洋供应商无法找到买家，空中客车公司最终可能会拥有精神航空系统公司（Spirit AeroSystems）在苏格兰和马来西亚的部分资产。【原文：Airbus may end up owning some assets of Spirit AeroSystems in Scotland and Malaysia if the transatlantic supplier is unable to find a buyer for them, a filing from the aerostructures company showed on Monday.】

item.title: 贝莱德在 Preqin 交易后预告将推出私募市场指数
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）资产管理公司周一表示，在宣布以近 32 亿美元收购数据提供商 Preqin 的交易后，该公司可能开始为私募市场提供指数和交易所交易基金（ETF）。【原文：BlackRock could start offering indexes and exchange-traded funds (ETFs) for private markets, the asset manager said on Monday, after it announced a deal to buy data provider Preqin for nearly $3.2 billion.】
